description: A pirate ship is depicted with pirates participating in a bizarre diving competition. Instead of a standard dive, a pirate is poised on a plank, seemingly about to be forced off. Three pirates act as judges, holding up scorecards displaying diving scores, applying formal athletic evaluation to a situation typically associated with execution. Figures in the water below suggest previous participants, one appearing distressed, highlighting the grim absurdity of treating this act as a sport.

other_text.location: held by pirate judge on the left
held by pirate judge in the middle
held by pirate judge on the right
